verification_methodology.description: URL accessibility verification followed by content matching analysis
steps: 1. URL Accessibility Check - Verify source URLs are reachable
2. Content Extraction - Fetch and parse source content
3. Claim Matching - Compare signal claims against source content
4. Cross-Validation - Check claims against independent sources
5. Classification - Categorize issues by hallucination type

hallucination_types.Type_A: URL Inaccessible - Source cannot be reached
hallucination_types.Type_B: Embellishment - Core facts correct but details exaggerated/added
hallucination_types.Type_C: Fabrication - Claims not supported by cited source
hallucination_types.Type_D: Temporal Confusion - Outdated data presented as current

flagged_signals.title: Return to Ancient Sensory Practices: Sound Baths, Moon Ceremonies
flagged_signals.description: Signal claims source discusses sound baths, astrology sessions, moon ceremonies, and star bathing. Actual source content covers Ultra-Personalized Regeneration Therapies, Emotional Fitness, Nature-Based Micro Retreats, Longevity-Forward Eating, and Social Wellness Resurgence. The specific ancient practices mentioned in the signal do NOT appear anywhere in the cited article.
flagged_signals.recommendation: Do not include in final report. If ancient wellness practices topic needed, find legitimate source that actually discusses these practices.

flagged_signals.title: Emotional Fitness Practices Evolve Beyond Journaling Apps
flagged_signals.description: Signal accurately captures emotional fitness trend but adds specific terminology not found in cited source. Terms 'emotional gyms', 'micro-therapy', 'mood-mapping', and 'cognitive resilience training' do not appear in the source article. Source confirms emotional fitness category, breathwork, and nervous system regulation focus.
flagged_signals.recommendation: Keep signal but remove unverified terminology. Update description to reflect only source-confirmed content.

clean_signals_sample.title: Vagus Nerve Stimulation Emerges as 2026 Wellness Protagonist
clean_signals_sample.notes: Core claims verified. Term 'protagonist' is editorial but accurately reflects source positioning as first listed trend.

clean_signals_sample.title: Wellness Shift from Hustle Culture to Sustainable Holistic Practices
clean_signals_sample.notes: Excellent source match. All major claims verified against article content.

clean_signals_sample.title: Mindfulness Association January 2026 Calendar: Beginner's Mind Theme
clean_signals_sample.notes: Complete verification. Calendar content, theme, and practices all confirmed.

distribution_notes.B_grade: 24 signals (35.3%) - Good confidence, some verification notes
distribution_notes.D_grade: 2 signals (2.9%) - Low confidence, use with caution

impact_assessment.reasoning: Of 68 signals, only 2 had hallucination issues (2.9%). One signal required removal (fabricated source content), one required correction (embellished terminology). The remaining 66 signals maintain strong source alignment. Report integrity is preserved with recommended actions implemented.

mandatory_removals.reason: Source content fabrication - claims do not match cited article

mandatory_corrections.correction: Remove terms: 'emotional gyms', 'micro-therapy', 'mood-mapping', 'wellness studios with somatic sessions'. Keep: emotional fitness trend, breathwork practices, nervous system regulation focus.
